input: usually , he would be tearing around the living room , playing with his toys .[MASK]
but just one look at a minion sent him practically catatonic .[MASK]
that had been megan 's plan when she got him dressed earlier .[MASK]

he 'd seen the movie almost by mistake , considering he was a little young for the pg cartoon , but with older cousins , along with her brothers , mason was often exposed to things that were older .[MASK]
she liked to think being surrounded by adults and older kids was one reason why he was a such a good talker for his age .[MASK]
since the movie was almost over , megan knew she better slip into the bedroom and finish getting ready .[MASK]
